alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 9:50PM MST until August 07 at 10:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 1030 PM MST. * At 949 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elfrida to 11 miles northwest of Bisbee- Douglas Airport to 6 miles east of Bisbee, moving east at 15 to 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Douglas, Bisbee, Bisbee-Douglas Airport, Pirtleville, Elfrida, McNeal and Rucker Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
